title: Healthcare Competency Enhancement: Jewelry Design Practical Pattern Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can classify three or more types of jewelry design patterns and analyze practical application cases
Learners can produce jewelry pattern drawings capable of actual product manufacturing using digital tools
Learners can propose two or more customized design solutions tailored to customer needs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
